data.text: Fly safely. We have rigorously sanitized the entire cabin through an intensive disinfection process. This is one of the procedures that we have implemented as part of our Health and Sanitization Management System. Learn more: https://t.co/wcJ0KL0ecn https://t.co/bzfbvgKdtX
@_Krisnakaye_ Krisna, please through DM share with us your reservation code. we will verify it. *HS

As part of our Health and Sanitization Management System, we announce our preventive measures at the airport regularly. Your safety is our top priority. https://t.co/wcJ0KL0ecn https://t.co/bsmLg0MECl
@rolandoarguell0 Hola, Rolando. Por favor indícanos si hay algo en lo que te podamos asistir. Nos preocupa que tengas esa percepción de nosotros. MA* https://t.co/JgS7hgjY2F

We implemented a single boarding line to allow some extra space while boarding. Learn more about the new way of flying with our Health and Sanitization Management System: https://t.co/wcJ0KLhP3V https://t.co/VdzywjJPvD

@Alicorona7 Hi Aly, information related to our customers reservation are sent to the emails registered on them. We are really sorry that  our lines are busy, please share with us your ticket number and request via DM to verify if we can assist you trough this media. *BQ

We have started a voluntary financial restructuring process to strengthen the airline. We continue operating normally and with the highest quality service. Learn more here: https://t.co/kQDk8MOUad #TogetherWeKeepFlying
We're working to provide you with more options. Learn about the latest updates to our flexibility waivers. https://t.co/IThXEbSwf2 https://t.co/AOMcHDrWBD

Your safety is our top priority. With our new Health and Sanitization Management System, you’re protected during every step of your journey. 
Learn more: https://t.co/wcJ0KLhP3V https://t.co/wwLzLR0c8q

Don't miss out– it's the last day of our Special Flight Sale! Start planning your next trip, and fly when you're ready. 

https://t.co/o5xZZEsVrE https://t.co/dqXiLqpoR1
